means.word_mean: 熟练的,精通的,内行的,杰出的

entry.def: A technician is someone whose job involves skilled practical work with scientific equipment, for example in a laboratory.
A technician is someone who is very good at the detailed technical aspects of an activity.

example.ex: ...a versatile, veteran player, a superb technician.
example.tran: 技术全面、经验丰富、技巧娴熟的运动能手

means.word_mean: 1. someone whose occupation involves training in a specific technical process
2. someone known for high skill in some intellectual or artistic technique

stems_affixes.value_cn: 各种工艺的,多种工艺的
stems_affixes.word_buile: poly多+technic[n.技术, 手法]→n.专门技术学校 adj.各种工艺的,多种工艺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 技术[性]的,工艺的;专门性的,专业性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: techn技术,能力+ical……的→adj.技术[性]的,工艺的;专门性的,专业性的
technology[n.科学技术;工业技术;应用科学]+ic表形容词→technologic
technologic[adj.工艺的, 技术的]+al表形容词→adj.科技的
poly多+technic[n.技术, 手法]→n.专门技术学校 adj.各种工艺的,多种工艺的
techn技术,能力+ic→n.技术, 手法
technic[n.技术, 手法]+ian人→n.技术员, 技师

stems_affixes.value_cn: 技术, 技巧, 方法, 表演法, 手法
stems_affixes.word_buile: techn技术,能力+ique→n.技术, 技巧, 方法, 表演法, 手法

stems_affixes.value_cn: 科学技术;工业技术;应用科学
stems_affixes.word_buile: techn技术,能力+ology学科→n.科学技术;工业技术;应用科学

Sentence.sentence: An X-rays technician is refusing to do her job until the firm agrees to replace its out-dated equipment.
The head technician in the lab tried to persuade the hospital administration to replace it, but they are trying to cut costs.
Decisions made by the head technician
